Description:
The perfect first home.
Situated in a family friendly pocket of Leopold, this home has a lot to offer and is sure to tick the boxes for first homeowners, young families and investors.
Behind the bold façade, this home offers 3 spacious bedrooms, a large study or 4th bedroom, 2 living zones, and a secure back yard perfect for those with pets or young children.
The large entry leads down the hallway to the light filled and open plan kitchen, living and dining area. The kitchen offers a large gas cook top, electric oven, dishwasher and plentiful storage.
Accommodation is well-appointed by way of a master bedroom with walk in robe and ensuite, as well as 2 bedrooms to the rear of the home, both with built in robes. The study offers ample space to be utilised as a 4th bedroom.
Features include: Gas central heating, split system air conditioning and a double remote garage with internal access.
Located only a 2 minute drive to the Gateway Plaza, 15 minutes to the Geelong CBD, 15 Minutes to the Bellarine Peninsular and 15 Minutes to Ocean Grove's pristine beaches; this property is central, practical and represents great value in today's market.

Description:
Tranquil Sea Change!
Beautifully placed within a green leafy pocket of Clifton Springs, this delightful residence boasts an unrivaled 'welcome home' feel! The custom build offers a lovely free flowing floor plan and dual light filled living zones courtesy of the northerly aspect. The stunning garden setting is sure to awaken your every sense; a visual spectacle in full bloom, the tranquillity of abundant bird life, lovely floral aromas and the impressive canopy of mature tree tops.
Three beautifully appointed bedrooms; master is complete with ensuite and walk in robe. The two additional bedrooms have built in robes
The primary living zone consists of a kitchen/family/meals area. The kitchen boasts expansive bench tops and great storage solutions. A glass sliding door creates a seamless connection to a private alfresco zone flanked by a glorious creeping vine
The second independent living area provides further flexibility to what is already a very adaptable floor plan
A double garage with the enviable feature of drive through access via rear roller door; room enough for the cars, boat and even the jet ski (the ultimate sea change lifestyle prospect)
All the modern comforts; ducted heating, split system cooling, external rear block out blinds, feature brick pressed paving and many more fine inclusions to be discovered on further inspection
The Bellarine Peninsula is a thriving market place; vibrant restaurant and cafe scene, award winning wine labels, beautiful parklands, excellent boating and fishing prospects and the unforgettable panoramic views of the bay and granite peaks of the You Yangs.

Description:
So Much Potential!
"State Government now permitting public OFI's for groups of 20 people, social distancing still applies"
There is potential aplenty at 24 Granville Street. If you are looking to invest for the future with the view to sub-divide then this neat 2 bedroom home on a generous 617m2 allotment could be the property for you. Alternatively if you are ready to downsize your home but not ready to move into a unit then this property would be worthy of your inspection. Tradies there is ample room here for all your gear in the double garage plus double carport- an office area complete with toilet and shower is located at the rear of the garage. First home buyers the time could be right for you to jump into the market as well. The home is neat, bright & cosy. Open plan living incorporating functional kitchen, compact meals area and north facing lounge is kept comfortable with gas heating and split system air conditioner. Great location handy to shops and public transport. Call today to arrange your private inspection.

Description:
SPIC and SPAN FAMILY HOME
Tastefully renovated and immaculately presented to the market for sale. This lovely property is located centrally to the local primary school, recreational facilities, boat ramp and the local shopping strip in Clifton Springs. The home has a spacious fully renovated kitchen with an open family living area that flows to a north facing entertaining deck with intermittent views of the bay. Blinds add privacy and protection from the elements.
There are three bedrooms in a separate wing with fully renovated, stylish family bathroom and ensuite.
No work to be done here carpets have been replaced, modern blinds installed and painting throughout.
Downstairs is a second living area, sleeping room for guests or the ultimate entertaining pad with access to the yard.
The yard is easy to maintain with a low care garden and a lovely secluded sitting area. Solar panels have been installed to provide energy efficiency and remote blinds to some windows. Do not wait to inspect this great property !

Description:
Where the Options are Endless!
An incredibly versatile floor plan split over 2 levels, matched with endless opportunities and a quiet court locale, this unique home is one not to be missed!
The home is perfect as is or could easily be transformed into your very own masterpiece. The low maintenance front garden offer a long driveway with access to the rear DLUG - ample room and storage for multiple cars, boats, caravans and all toys in between. Upon entry to the home you're welcomed by a sun-drenched living space, which effortlessly flows into the dining and fully equipped kitchen. 3 spacious bedrooms all with built-in-robes, master with en-suite, sit from the rear central hallway of the ground level and all complete by a family bathroom, separate toilet and laundry. Float upstairs where Bay views are enjoyed from the open 2nd living area, where a further 2 bedrooms with built-in-robes are also on offer.
A sizeable 585m2 block offers a secure and spacious back garden, room for the whole family to run and enjoy!
Additional features of the home include - split system heating and cooling, log fire, ceiling fans, manicured gardens both front and back.
Whether you're needing room for the growing family, a potential dual occupancy set up or looking for your next project, this charming abode will delight!

Description:
AN IMPRESSIVE HENLEY HOME, RAIL TRAIL POSITION.ON APP. 703 SQM......OUTSTANDING!
As new, so well maintained , having plenty of space for the family , yet stylish and nothing to do but create your own haven. A spacious entrance/hallway through to open plan living which includes well designed kitchen and generous dining as well, timber doors open to the undercover entertaining area. Second living room is adjacent while the third is currently used as library/study ....make it what you wish. Four bedrooms are all extra generous, three with BIR'S, the master has WIR and large ensuite. Central bathroom, laundry and separate toilet . Features include central heating, split system, granite bench, high ceilings, glass splashback and quality fittings. Double garage, double rear garage /workshop as well as cemented side drive to hold caravan and /or boat, could do six if needed. An absolute gem in a top spot for access to leisure, schools and all town amenities.

Description:
Delightful Family Living Awaits
Occupying a corner block on approx. 518m2, this home offers room to move both inside and out!
Positioned directly opposite the sporting grounds, youll love that a lush green outlook is yours to keep. Public transport is footsteps away, while a short stroll will find you at the local playground and BBQ facilities. Easy access to the Gateway Plaza and Leopold P.S. puts the practical elements in place.
With the interiors in immaculate condition, theres nothing left to do but move in and enjoy. The open plan living/dining/kitchen zone creates the lively hub of the home, with sliding doors opening onto both the backyard and spacious outdoor entertaining deck. This indoor-outdoor flow is perfect for modern-day living and entertaining loved ones. The kitchen features stone benchtops, a built-in pantry, and stainless steel appliances (dishwasher and 900mm oven, gas hob, rangehood). The lounge creates yet another spot to pop up your feet and relax.
Zoned to the front of the home, the Master Bedroom makes a statement with feature wallpaper, a walk-in robe, and en suite. Two additional bedrooms are wonderfully spacious and boast built-in robes. The main bathroom, separate toilet, and laundry with storage complete the functional floorplan. Ducted heating and a split-system air conditioner keep you comfortable in all seasons.
Youll love relaxing under the shade of the outdoor entertaining deck, while you watch the kids play in the north-facing backyard. Children will adore the cubby house and sandpit, while the herb garden offers you an abundance of fresh ingredients. Gorgeous gardens grace both the front and backyard, with a rainwater tank promoting sustainability. Caravan and boat owners will see the potential to create side access to the backyard via Tispa Drive (STCA). The remote double lock-up garage features internal access.
Showcasing immaculate interiors and gorgeous outdoor living, every inch of this home will delight! Inspect ASAP!

Description:
VIEWS ALL DAY LONG !
If views of the water are what you desire then 19 Tingara provides them a plenty ! Elevated to capture the stunning outlook from the wrap around balcony, natural light floods in to the massive living areas from the east and west. Panoramic northerly views are a feature across the water to the You Yangs and Mt Anakie.
This established brick veneer home longs for that modern update to bring it back to it's former glory. On entry at the ground floor level there is potential for the third bedroom and adjacent powder room/ garage to become a self contained retreat.
Upstairs the spacious kitchen-dining area has access to the under cover deck. A new oven & cook top, DW and plenty of storage in this very workable kitchen ! The main bedroom suite has ample storage and a spacious ensuite, the second bedroom, a family bathroom and laundry complete this level. Many more features make this a great property to consider - gas central heating, ducted vacuum, massive underfloor storage space, over sized double garage with room for a work shop at the rear, rear access from the garage and still more !! there is side access beside the garage large enough for a van or boat on this 713m2
Please contact the agent directly to organise a private inspection.

Description:
The Perfect Downsizer/Starter/Investment Does Exist!
Positioned in the exclusive Estuary Estate in the heart of Leopold, this contemporary residence is only a few years young and is brimming with loads of quality extras. Offering exceptional value for money, this abode makes an affordable starter, impeccable downsizer or lucrative investment opportunity.
Landscaped gardens welcome you to the home, whereupon stepping inside, modern interiors finished in a neutral palette are revealed. An inviting open plan family and meals area flow effortlessly to the gourmet kitchen. Designed to please the Masterchef within, the kitchen boasts stone benchtops, gas cooking and a walk-in pantry. Fire up the barbie and enjoy Friday night drinks under the covered alfresco area while you watch the kids and pets roam around in the level and fully fenced backyard.
The master suite is a private sanctuary serviced by a his and hers walk through robe and a deluxe ensuite. The remaining two bedrooms share an elegant family bathroom complete with a shower, bath and a separate toilet. The second bedroom features built-in robes whilst the third bedroom has soundproofing and can also be used as a rumpus or home theatre.
Occupying an easy care 400m2 block, other premium features include ducted heating and split system cooling, double lock-up garage with internal access and double-glazed windows.
Estuary Estate is renowned for its sporting fields and clubs, beautiful reserves and walkways. Serviced by public transport, the home is also accessible to the Geelong CBD, Bellarine and local beaches. The home is also moments to local schools and shops with a Bunnings up the road and the Gateway Plaza shopping centre.
Near new, there's nothing left to do but move-in or rent out. Priced to meet the market, this one will sell fast. Call now to arrange an inspection today.

Description:
Blink and you WILL miss this!
Million-dollar Bay views, a quality renovation throughout, all while being a mere 400 metres from the water's edge. Positioned arguably at one of Clifton Springs best addresses, blink and I assure you, it will be missed!
Showcasing the utmost quality and design throughout, the elevated position and north/westerly aspect allows an abundance of natural light to stream through, giving it a light, bright and airy feel. The main hub of the home comprises an open plan kitchen with SS appliances and 40mm stone benchtops, dining and a spacious living area. 3 bedrooms sit from the central hallway, the master bedroom with WIR and ensuite, while the remaining 2 offer BIR's. A feature barn sliding door leads into the luxe bathroom, boasting stone top vanity, corner shower and free-standing bathtub, with a separate toilet and laundry with outdoor access completing this neat as a pin and stylish abode.
The backyard is a blank canvas and offers incredible views. Deck out as an impressive outdoor entertaining area to capture the best of the Bay, keep as is for an open grassed space for the kids to run amuck or utilise it as additional storage for multiple cars, trailers, boats, as double gates from High Ridge Drive makes for easy access - the options are truly endless!
Additional Features Include Ducted Heating, 2 split systems (living & master bedroom), stone benchtops throughout, quality fixtures and fittings, abundance of storage, oversized DLUG with workbench and external access and a 581m2 corner block allotment.
Watch the world pass by from your front verandah, while enjoying the endless views. Beacon Point Reserve, beach access and public transports are all at your front door, while all major amenities, the boat ramp, golf club and finest wineries and eateries are only moments away.

Description:
Contemporary living In Sought After Locale
PLEASE CONTACT US TO REGISTER FOR OPEN INSPECTIONS
Nestled amongst quality homes in one of Leopolds most convenient locations is this stunning family home. Upon entering you will be surprised by its natural size and what it has to offer. As you walk through, you have the front living room to your left, a calming spot to kick back and relax and the master bedroom to your right.
Overlooking the front garden, the spacious Master Bedroom creates a private oasis for parents. The walk-in robe is wonderfully spacious with an en-suite. Three additional generous size bedrooms with built-in robes share close access to the main bathroom and separate toilet. Add to this a double remote lock-up garage with internal access, gas ducted heating throughout and a split system in the open plan living room keeping you comfortable in all seasons.
The stylish kitchen with large island stone bench has plenty of cupboard space, Technika 5 burner gas cook top, Westinghouse electric wall oven, pantry and dishwasher. A spacious open plan kitchen, meals and living area with convenient sliding door access to outdoor undercover alfresco area. This indoor-outdoor flow is ideal for everyday living and entertaining.
With the Portarlington Hwy just on your doorstep and a 10 minute drive to Geelong, 50 minutes to Melbourne and the rest of Bellarine nearby you will be spoilt for choice. Only 5 minutes to Gateway Plaza shopping centre, local schools, kindergartens and sporting facilities.
This wonderful home is an ideal entry into this ever-popular suburb or the perfect investment. With a low maintenance back yard area on a manicured 496m2 allotment (approx). If you're looking for the perfect family home without compromising on lifestyle, then don't go past this fabulous single-level home.

Description:
Lake View 12.62 ha 31 acres approx.
With stunning views of Lake Connewarre, this superbly positioned lifestyle property on approximately 31 acres of land is on the fringe of residential development/zoning and offers a superb country lifestyle or land banking opportunity.
Surrounded by established trees with two road frontages, the long driveway sets the solid brick home away from the road in a private hilltop position. This ideal lifestyle property is suited to horses, cropping or establishing a vineyard.
The homestead consists of three bedrooms, master with walk in robe and ensuite, family room with wood fire, separate dining room, kitchen/dining/living with wood fire and split system, bathroom, laundry and undercover pergola.
Externally there is a four car garage, tandem carport, workshop with cement floor, machinery sheds, garden shed, bird aviary, three large dams and the property is connected to town water.
Perfectly positioned for lifestyle convenience close to Leopold's Gateway Plaza, sports complex, schools, public transport, medical facilities, 10 minutes to Geelong CBD, an hour to Melbourne and within easy access to the Bellarine Peninsula's award winning wineries, restaurants, surf beaches and golf courses.

Description:
Coast Meets Country
This near new, 18-month-old home offers low maintenance, contemporary living, set within a private cul-de-sac and offering a unique rural outlook all upon a 491m2 block.
The home is light, bright and offers a neutral colour palette throughout. The fully equipped kitchen with 900ml electric oven, 5 burner gas cook top and 40ml stone benchtops, also offers a spacious walk-in-pantry and overlooks the dining and open living space. Well zoned, the master bedroom sits at the fore of the home with walk-in-robe and ensuite, while the remaining 2 bedrooms offer built-in-robes. A separate lounge, study nook, central bathroom and laundry complete this neat as a pin abode.
The serene rural outlook can be enjoyed from the main hub of the home, before sliding doors provide access to the extended outdoor undercover entertaining space, with a second undercover pergola also on offer.
Additional features include ducted heating, split system heating and cooling, an abundance of storage, DLUG with internal and external access, over-sized garden shed, low maintenance gardens front and back and all complete with additional side storage for multiple cars, caravans, boats or the trailer.
A tightly held pocket close to public transport, major amenities, and the best of the Bellarine all at your fingertips, this home will suit anyone from first home buyers, the growing family or downsizers who are still looking for space to tinker!
*All information about the property has been provided to Hayeswinckle by third parties. Hayeswinckle has not verified the information and does not warrant its accuracy or completeness. Parties should make and rely on their own enquiries in relation to this property.

Description:
Bespoke Quality and Design
With high end quality fixtures and fittings throughout, this 4-year-old, custom built residence is positioned perfectly in a private, tucked away pocket of Leopold and with the Bellarine Rail Trail at your doorstep, this is a sure standout on the market!
Oozing the ultimate in luxury and elegant design, the home is cleverly zoned for practical living with the growing family in mind and offers an incredibly light, bright and airy feel. The main hub lends itself in the way of an open plan chef's kitchen with all ASKO appliances, including electric pyrolytic oven, separate steam oven, combination induction and gas cook top, dishwasher, granite benchtops and butler's pantry, while overlooking the dining and living space. The master retreat sits at the fore of the home with walk-in-robe, additional built-in-robe and lavish ensuite. The remaining 3 bedrooms all sit from the rear West Wing and make for the perfect set up for multigenerational/dual occupancy living and serviced by a central bathroom. A separate lounge/media room, study nook with built-in-shelves, laundry and drying room complete this unique home.
What really sets it apart from the rest is the phenomenal garaging and storage on offer. A DLUG, separate SLUG with through access to the backyard and additional 4x4.6m garage/workshop, will be a dream for all tradies, those with multiple cars, trailers or who work from home. Also comprising an expansive undercover entertaining deck, alfresco and established low maintenance gardens with room to tinker.
Additional Features Include: Hydronic heating, evaporative cooling, plantation shutters, grand 2.7m ceilings, ceiling fans, spotted Gum floors, a plethora of storage and sky lights fitted in the butler's pantry, ensuite and walk-in-robe.
With Leopold offering the perfect blend of city and coastal living and with local amenities and infrastructure continuing to grow, make your move today!
*All information about the property has been provided to Hayeswinckle by third parties. Hayeswinckle has not verified the information and does not warrant its accuracy or completeness. Parties should make and rely on their own enquiries in relation to this property.

Description:
Golf Course Views With Big Potential!
When a classic home like this presents itself after not being on the market for nearly 20 years, you definitely need to add a property like this to your inspection list. 22 Coronae Drive presents a great opportunity for those looking to break into the first home buyer market, those looking to renovate and invest or build something to your own tastes and requirements or townhouse development (STCA). The home is a blank palette and with the right amount of imagination could be transformed into something special. Featuring a classic floorplan design with 3 bedrooms, a spacious living room and a practical kitchen, the home is offset with a fantastic outlook and access to the Clifton Springs Golf Club. Located close to all the lifestyle pursuits that the Bellarine Peninsula is renowned for, a short stroll to public transport, excellent array of the area's finest schools, public or private & access to the Bellarine Peninsulas world class restaurants & wineries - all of which enhance the opportunity for the savvy buyer to see the appeal of this prestigious location.
Land size: 722sqm approx.

Description:
VERY SOLID FASHAM & JOHNSON BUILD IN OLD LEOPOLD.
Popular builders from the 70's and still current today this solid home has been tastefully re-decorated and beautifully presented on a lovely landscaped allotment of 788M2.
Lots of natural light transpire into the living, dining kitchen area further enhanced by the embossed timber flooring. Updated kitchen adjoined by the very roomy dining space and large living area providing split system cooling and gas heating. Three or four bedrooms/study, master offering semi ensuite with toilet, 2nd family bathroom with the shower over the bath. Undercover entertaining area or all year round enjoyment, side drive access to an undercover three car carport plus additional shed for workshop and storage. Very private and secure property with high fencing for you to enjoy your tranquil time in the vast gardens with a variety of trees and shrubs and an abundance of space for the kids to roam . Well presented and positioned in Leopold close to transport and the growing shopping centre. First home buyer's will rejoice with what is on offer.

Description:
Custom Built Modern Home
A modern design and perfect location to the entire Bellarine Peninsula, this custom built one of a kind 4BR family home is an ideal fit for buyers looking for a superior finish, ample car storage, indoor/outdoor living and a Clifton Springs address. Sleeping quarters are at the front of the home and designed to enjoy privacy and space with oversized bedrooms, whilst the rear of the home enjoys a large well-appointed galley style kitchen overlooking the living spaces comprising carpeted rumpus room and open plan living dining area flowing onto a spacious undercover alfresco entertaining with bar. The timber laminated floors run through the high traffic areas of the home creating ease of living with modern tones, whilst the generous triple garage with drive through 2.3m high access into the secure yard coupled with ample off street parking in the driveway create space for the boat or Caravan. Added features include home office/study, modern timber on white finish, ducted heating, reverse cycle air conditioning and a Clifton Springs Primary School zoned position. One out of the box with nothing left to do and less than 12 months old, the home is ready for its new family to move in and enjoy.

Description:
"A RARE FIND INDEED"
Please contact John directly on 0412 745 029 to arrange a private inspection.
The heading says it all. This property could suit the downsizer, first home buyer, tradie or developer.
Nestled on a 674m2 ALLOTMENT, in a quiet court and ZONED RESIDENTIAL GROWTH.
This charming brick veneer residence is surrounded by delightful established gardens and features three generous bedrooms, two with BIRs and master bedroom includes WIR plus ensuite. Entry leads to formal lounge with SS air conditioning. Spacious family room has gas heating and opens to extensive, paved outdoor entertainment area. Laminate kitchen includes gas cooking, pantry and ample cupboard and bench space. Separate bathroom and laundry.
The beauty of this property that it is in a quiet court location only a few minutes walk to the Drysdale Shopping Centre and very handy to schools, bowls club, golf course, public transport, boat ramps and all the benefits that the Bellarine Peninsula has to offer. The Residential Growth Zoning could be enticing to the developer.
Indeed, a rare find in a truly excellent location.
Due to restrictions imposed as a result of the Corona Virus, this property can only be inspected by private appointment. Please ring John on 0412 745 029 to make your appointment.

Description:
TOP SPOT! 826 SQM LAND! AROUND THE CORNER TO SHOPS & ALL AMENITIES!
Wow what a position, stroll for your paper, groceries, library, doctor, school, all shops and parklands for leisure or enjoy market day. No. 5 has been renovated with only the kitchen to complete, just boxing really and some paintwork. Long verandah with entrance to spacious lounge and adjacent dining room, new kitchen with another area for that smaller second living space. Four bedrooms, three with BIR'S, central bathroom and laundry. Features Rinnai space heater, electric heater, split system, new 900m upright stove, dishwasher, fans, pantry , external blinds, new carpets and floorboards. Freestanding garage and plenty of room for boat, caravan, another vehicle, even add a bungalow for extended family STCA. All done just move in and add your touch to make no. 5 Diana your home, that is all it will take. The living will be easy here in the heart of Drysdale with the beautiful Bellarine Peninsula to enjoy.

Description:
Sweet First Home - Potential Plus
Perfect for the first home buyer or renovator ! This little gem is ready for a fresh coat of paint and some modern touches. The substantial residential allotment of 777m2 offers an investment for the future for the lucky purchaser. Located in a quiet street close to the centre of Drysdale and the Clifton Springs boat ramp & golf club.
The living area faces north and is flooded with dappled light from established trees at the front and side of the property. An adjacent dining area and kitchen provide a spacious open plan. Three good-sized bedrooms with BIRs x 2 and floor to ceiling windows that allow plenty of light.
A single colorbond garage has power connected/ concrete flooring and a single carport nearby. Located close to public transport and local schools.

Description:
Enviable Rural Lifestyle Close to the Coast
Contact the listing agent to arrange a private inspection.
Set back from Swan Bay Road in a quiet pocket of rural tranquillity - and just a few minutes drive from spectacular coastal surf beaches - this smart, contemporary home on just over 5 acres offers a truly enviable lifestyle.
As you drive through the solar-powered front security gate, you pass a mature and fully-productive olive grove, a fabulous range of fruit trees, and a careful selection of established trees that have been retained to provide ideal shade around the property.
In traditional Australian style, the homestead sports a north-facing front verandah, a west-facing paved pergola, and a south-facing deck that overlooks a sparkling swimming pool.
Inside, a relaxed lounge offers a delightful bay window with garden views, and a split-system for year-round comfort. The dining area has access to the deck, via a sliding door, and the galley-style kitchen, with its own butlers pantry, provides every amenity for creating fine cuisine. Theres a large Westinghouse electric oven and ceramic cooktop, a Bosch dishwasher, stone bench tops, and loads of cupboard space and built-in shelving. The large deck is an obvious destination for alfresco dining and entertainment. Down a central hall are a laundry, an ultra-modern bathroom, three bedrooms with built-in robes and ceiling fans, and a master bedroom with a walk-through robe, and an ensuite. Electric heating from the slab keeps everything toasty during the cooler months.
The property is divided into 3 paddocks, all with rabbit-proof fencing, and the three sheds all have electric power - plus the large 5-bay Workshop/Machinery shed also has water and two roller doors.
Other features of interest are fixed wireless NBN, a 22,500 litre water tank, a 140 sq.m. chicken run, and a 10 m. long raised veggie bed with mushroom compost. Plus the option of purchasing a 22.5 hp Massey Ferguson Tractor and attachments.
Inspection is highly recommended.
Insights: 82-90 Swan Bay Road, Wallington VIC 3222 was last sold in 2020.
